review_blob: An embarrassment to the United States.  There are so many good beers in the US.  How is this one of the most popular?  Watery, tasteless mess of a beer!  This beer should not be served in any vessel, but poured straight into the toilet.
Thin, boring American lager.  I guess it is a better alternative than Bud...not much though.  PA has much better breweries than this one.  Try a Stoudts Pils or maybe a Victory Prima.
